name: Obscure Realm
description: Obscure Realm, a game for arcade players who want to play more! With lots of ways to finish, win, lose, die, gain health, cheat and so much more.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7+XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Intel® Core™ i7 Processor Graphics: 1256 Intel(R) HD Graphics Family Additional Notes: These are my specs, there are many like them but these ones are mine.
recommended_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel® Core™ i7 Processor Graphics: 256 Intel(R) HD Graphics Family Additional Notes: Your so special you know that?
